headline: John Bolton Gets the Last Laugh
abstract: He’s the president’s bane and impeachment’s star.
lead_paragraph: President Trump’s reaction to the leak of incriminating details in John Bolton’s forthcoming book shocked me. Not the part where the president said that Bolton was making up a Ukraine quid pro quo in the service of the best-seller list — that he was lying for lucre. Trump sees that transaction everywhere he looks, because he sees it first and foremost in the mirror.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
